org.gwtbootstrap3.client.ui.base
Class ValueBoxErrorSupport

java.lang.Object
  org.gwtbootstrap3.client.ui.base.ValueBoxErrorSupport
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.google.gwt.event.logical.shared.AttachEvent.Handler, com.google.gwt.event.shared.EventHandler, ValueBoxBase.EditorErrorSupport
public class ValueBoxErrorSupport
extends Object
implements ValueBoxBase.EditorErrorSupport

This is the default ValueBoxBase.EditorErrorSupport implementation. The assumption is that every ValueBoxBase instance will have a HasValidationState parent. If there is a HelpBlock that is a child of the HasValidationState parent then error messages will be displayed in the HelpBlock. Example: User

Author:
Steven Jardine
